Articles.Content:
So, I've gotten real good at docking and have filled various Kerbin orbits with monsters built in orbit:

Here's my T-station, built out of about 12 separate launches, holding 16 kerbonauts:

Here's my O-station, a meaningless spider of a thing:

And here's something I slapped together just now for no reason:

This one is stable with the help of the Quantum Strut mod, and it has some good-sized engines still on there. Looks like it could go somewhere, at least as soon as I slap on the fourth giant tank (and maybe four more on the bottom).

What should I do with stuff like this? Any cool ideas for an interplanetary giant? I kind of like the 3rd design posted, with the docking ports staggered outward.

Refueling mothership:

A part of this mission

Return to Duna: (In Progress)

Mission to re-establish contact with the base on Duna and provide

the Ike Outpost crew with fuel and supplies so they can return home.
Those are some nice stations, but have you tried designing modules with interiors? The large rectangular wings and metal panels are perfect, with symetry mode, for creating hollow structures:

Landge: MOTHER OF GOD that's large. I wish my computer could handle it; physics simulation began to chug on the T-Station (turned the time display yellow) so I stopped building that one. I guess I could pull back on the part count a little but it really doesn't have all that much in the way of extras.

zpox: I think I will try something like that! Thanks
This is what I plan on doing next, but bigger

Those are some nice stations, but have you tried designing modules with interiors? The large rectangular wings and metal panels are perfect, with symetry mode, for creating hollow structures:

http://i.imgur.com/C9hPNjU.png

That's interesting zpox, what will you do with it?

That's interesting zpox, what will you do with it?

I have sat here for like 5 minutes and still can't think what I could do with that other then just have a gathering of Kerbals in there

How did you manage to get these linked together?

This is what I plan on doing next, but bigger

How did you manage to get these linked together?

Not mine, just inspiration from Reddit.

Here: http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/1cllci/ring_one_of_jebediah_memorial_space_station/

But it's just docking ports placed together correctly.
